channel.title: Tutorial Island
channel.description:
This is going to be my attempt to create a full tutorial island.
Intro: Complete. Basic dialogue, probably gonna go back and re-do it when I'm done.
Survivalist tutor: Not started
Cooking tutor: Not started
Combat tutor: Not started
Money tutor: Not started
Prayer Tutor: Not started
Magic Tutor: Not started
[img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/tutty1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/tutty2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/tutty3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/tutty4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/tutty5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/tutty4.jpg[/img]
Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=20aq-l9DdAU
I never did play real RuneScape, so if you can help me with more tutors I may have missed, that'd be great.
Credits Me ChaosPker for his source and teaching me to program

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

D D 3:

Just a bunch of NPC dialouge and item adding commands, but good luck.

Where the fuck have you been?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 6, 2009 01:32:36 am[/size][hr][quote=“Seren”]I don’t mean to spam or break any rules… but can i have a link to the rules please?[/quote]

Here’s the link to the Official forum rules:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html

There are also rules for each section, so you’d better read those as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

OK. It just bothers the question :Why do people insist on excessive starters? Give people what they NEED to start. Give them 1 bronze axe, 1 bronze pick, hammer, pot, bucket, etc. Not tons of runes and Millions of gold.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @shane11 shane11
item.description:
@shane11 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:19, topic:286885”]Why give them so many runes and 3 mil…[/quote] It’s the starter it already had from the source I used. And I haven’t changed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @shane11 shane11
item.description:
@shane11 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:14, topic:286885”][quote author=r34p4g3pk link=topic=379405.msg2853336#msg2853336 date=1246673333]

You’re attempting, but what’s the point of this in private servers?
[/quote]I guess it makes the server more like runescape. Also, you need to fix your models, theres random ice models in your pictures.

No one joins private servers to play something similar to RuneScape. They want an easier way out. ;)[/quote]This isn’t for a public thing, it’s joke something I’m doing for fun. It’s a little project.[quote=“Lin, post:16, topic:286885”]Wow. You’re trying to remake something you’ve never seen, and it’s the very first thing you do when starting RuneScape…

Until you actually go through it, I give you no support. It’s already missing things from the very start.[/quote]I couldn’t care less.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“shane11, post:7, topic:286885”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=379405.msg2853174#msg2853174 date=1246662540]
He’s after the cooking in that one place. You have to do an emote RIGHT after you leave and you have to run to him.
[/quote]Um, that’s kind of confusing. When I get back from vacation wanna help me out just with telling me how to do stuff?[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=379405.msg2853175#msg2853175 date=1246662575]
Good luck buddy
[/quote]Thanks buddy :D[/quote]

I’ll get on right now if you’d like. >_>

EDIT:
Look at the first pic. On the mini-map, up North, he’s located in there.

Read full topic
